Class JsonFileLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.codeleaf.config.json.JsonFileLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public final class JsonFileLoader
extends Object
implements SpecificationLoader
    Implements a specification loader for json files.

    0.1.0
    Author:
    tvburger@gmail.com
    See Also:

      • loadSpecification

        public Specification loadSpecification(String specificationName)
                                throws SpecificationNotFoundException,
                                       IOException,
                                       SpecificationFormatException
        Loads the specification with the given name
        Specified by:
        loadSpecification in interface SpecificationLoader
        Parameters:
        specificationName - the name of the specification to load
        Returns:
        the loaded specification
        Throws:
        SpecificationNotFoundException - if this loader does not contain a specification with the given name
        IOException - if the loader fails to read the specification
        SpecificationFormatException - if the specification is in the wrong format

      • hasSpecification

        Returns true if this loader contains a specification with the given name, otherwise false

        Returns:

      • create

        public static JsonFileLoader create(File parentPath)
        Creates a new instance reading from the parentPath.
        Parameters:
        parentPath - the parent path to use for reading the json files.
        Returns:
        the new instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the parentPath is not a directory
